content: here fishy fishy fishy www craftkitten com original pattern by jennifer reeve materials scrap yarn scrap yarn in contrasting color crochet hook 1 size smaller than recommended for gauge 1 stitch marker stuffing catnip if desired i suggest pellets as they are less messy you can find them for a good deal at http //www drsfostersmith com/ abbreviations chain= chain round= round single_crochet= single_crochet fish repeat= repeat make magic_ring as follows hold end of yarn in loop twist twice insert hook in decrease= *insert hook in next st yo loop chain 1 draw loop through insert hook in round 1 work 8 single_crochet in ring next st yo draw loop through yo round 2 & 3 work even place marker on 1st stitch continue to keep marker on first st draw through all 3 loops of each round round 4 work 2 single_crochet in each st around 16sc round 5 & 6 work even round 7 *work 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next st repeat from * around 24sc round 8 & 9 work even round 10 *decrease 1 single_crochet in next st repeat from * around 16sc round 11 & 12 work even at this point fill with scrap yarn or stuffing & catnip if desired round 13 decrease around 8sc round 14 & 15 work even fasten_off leaving a long tail tail fins join with slip_stitch to one side of tail chain 10 round 1 single_crochet in each chain work 3 single_crochet in last chain turning to opposite side of the chain work 1 single_crochet in each chain of under side work 2 in last single_crochet round 2 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet 1hdc in next single_crochet 1dc in next single_crochet 1 treble_crochet in next single_crochet 1dc in next single_crochet 1hdc in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in corner single_crochet on opposite side work 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet 1hdc in next single_crochet 1dc in next single_crochet 1 treble_crochet in next single_crochet 1dc in next single_crochet 1hdc in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet slip_stitch to next single_crochet fasten_off repeat for other fin starting at opposite side of tail opening assembly with yarn needle and tail sew tail closed and fins in place with yarn needle & contrasting yarn sew on gills and eyes throw to nearest kitty and watch wackiness ensue as with the octopus cat toy please consider making a few of these for charity craft kitten also grants permission to make and sell these cat toys for charitable causes www craftkitten com © craft kitten 2006 all rights reserved do not copy or distribute without permission sale of finished items is prohibited
